version_description: - Bugfixes

HALLOWEEN SPECIAL:

Starting from 19.10. and for 14 whole days, this special brings you…

* Regards from the Guilds, Land Reform and Military Review special events
* A new event resource: Halloween-Emblems
* Rewarded tasks for getting Rubies and other precious rewards
* Three new shop packages with special discounts
* Vikings and Siege Units temporarily available during the event
* Call Back All Units: Easily call back all your units from foreign habitats with this mass function
* Support Bridge: Manually set a start time for the bridge
* Support Bridge: The arrival time finder can be directly opened via the buttons in the support bridge
* Bugfixes

Some new features initially are only active on selected worlds.
- Bugfixes

* Black Friday Sale: Starting from Black Friday on 24th of November and for 36 hours, two gold packages will be heavily discounted on sale during the event!
* Habitat Reservations - Display Requests: On the map you can now see which habitats have been requested by other alliance members
* „Not Enough Gold“ Pop-up: If you haven't enough for a certain action, you will now get a gold package suggested that suits to you the best
* Push Notification - Guest Account Login: This new push notification let's you know when someone uses the guest login you created
* Push Notification - Support Bridge: By activating this notification, you will get a push message as soon as another alliance member shares a support bridge link
* Bugfixes

Some new features initially are only active on selected worlds.

* WINTER FESTIVAL:
Starting from 01.12. and for the whole month of December, this special brings you…
- ADVENT CALENDAR: Surprise daily tasks from 1st to 24th of December!
- NEW GLOBAL BUILDING: Decrease costs for units & buildings and increase resource production!
- NEW MAP GRAPHICS: The strategical map is now covered in snow!
- NEW EVENT RESOURCE: Gather Christmas-Emblems and earn Rubies!
- NEW GOLD PACKAGES: Huge discounts for gold coins with these new packages!

* Notepad: Use the new search functionality to find your notes in one second!
* Bugfixes

- Bugfixes

- REQUEST RESOURCES: Fill up the resource stocks of a chosen habitat with transports up to a manually defined limit
- GO TO-BUTTON IN QUEST SYSTEM: When trying to complete a quest, you can now directly jump to the respective screen 
- RECOMMENDED TASKS IN QUEST SYSTEM: Tasks are sorted by priority
- ATTACK BUTTON IMPROVEMENTS: Attack button is greyed out instead of being removed when no attack is possible

Some new features initially are only active on selected worlds.

Valentine's Special:
Call your subjects together, because from 02/12/2018 to 02/21/2018 we have the following for you:
- Three special events will be activated directly one after another!
- Viking units and siege weapons will be available for recruitment for a limited time!
- Collect the new event-resource and earn rubies!
- Exclusive Gold packages will be available!
- Bugfixes
- Bugfixes
- Bugfixes
- Fixed two crashes that happened to some players occasionally
Prepare for the huge upcoming Easter event!
- Bugfixes
- Bugfixes
- Bugfixes
- Bugfixes

* Architect - Upgrade: The new architect is able to upgrade all habitat types at once for a second time!

* Call Back All Units - Improvement: A new setting now enables all players to switch between the display of the home habitat of all units or the currently stationed habitat

* SEVENTH ANNIVERSARY:
From 04.06. - 11.06. Lords & Knights will celebrate it’s seventh anniversary! Expect special events, special tasks and free gold coins:
- Get 300 free gold coins during the time of the event
- Perform special in-game tasks and earn valuable rubies!
- Three big in-game events are waiting for you:
1. Transport capacity: The transport capacity of all unity is increased by 100%
2. Military review: 50% less resource costs for unit recruitments
3. Land reform: 50% less silver costs for conquering habitats

Some new features initially are only active on selected worlds.

* Architect - Upgrade: The new architect is able to upgrade all habitat types at once for a second time!
* Call Back All Units - Improvement: A new setting now enables all players to switch between the display of the home habitat of all units or the currently stationed habitat


Some new features initially are only active on selected worlds.

7.1.0
*HUGE NEW FEATURE: "Regions":
You can now rule over a whole region on the map, visually divided by huge walls!
Your alliance can capture a Region by controlling the majority of habitats in it
Ruling over a region results in powerful buffs
New huge element on map: Region Habitat
Once conquered, you can upgrade your Region Habitat
New alliance-features: Treasury and Treasurer (new role!)
Only available on the new game worlds

*New Worlds:
Launch of 4 new game worlds with the "Regions" on 10.10.2018!

*Bugfixes
We continuously work to improve Lords & Knights and therefore applied several bug fixes and small improvements to optimize your gaming experience!

* WINTER FESTIVAL:
Starting from 01.12. and for the whole month of December, this special brings you…
- ADVENT CALENDAR: Surprise daily tasks from 1st to 25th of December!
- NEW GLOBAL BUILDING: Decreases costs for units & buildings and increases resource production as well ruby drop chance!
- NEW EVENT RESOURCE: Gather Christmas-Emblems and earn Rubies!
- NEW GOLD PACKAGES: Huge discounts for gold coins with these new packages!

* Regions-Features:
- New Alliance Medals: Earn treasury medals for donated resources, visible for all your alliance mates!
- New Ranking: Regions-Ranking shows the alliances owning the most regions!
- New Deeplinks: These new links directly lead to the respective region!

* Bugfixes

Some new features initially are only active on selected worlds.

We continuously work to improve Lords & Knights and therefore applied several bug fixes and small improvements to optimize your gaming experience!

* New battle server: "Bellicum I"
This special game world is clearly focused on epic battles and is, therefore, particularly interesting for those among you looking for a challenge where It doesn’t dwell on long lasting development, but is all about going straight into the thick of the fight.

* Special: Super Bowl
- World Events: You have the chance to complete tasks and earn valuable rubies
- Regards from the Guilds: 50% resource costs for upgrading buildings
- Fight the Vacancy: Buy free castles for 50% less Gold and free fortresses for 25% less Gold.

* New Features:
- Alliance Tournaments: New competitions in which alliances compete in different categories. The winner-alliance receives precious rewards for the alliance treasury as well as every single member to honour their success!
- Abandon Habitats: The new possibility to simply give up a hard to defend habitat on the map and to receive a compensation for it!

* Bugfixes

Valentine’s Day Special Event:

Call your subjects together, because from 11.02.2019 until 25.02.2019 11:00 CET (05:00 EST) we have the following for you:

* New event-resource: Earn “Valentine‘s-Emblems“ only during this event and exchange them for the precious Rubies by using your task list!
* New event-building: A unique building “Castle Garden", that increases both resource production and the ruby drop chance while at the same time reducing all building costs!
* Architect-Upgrade: The new architect is able to upgrade all habitat types at once for a second time!
* Vikings and Siege Weapons: The Vikings and Siege Weapons are strong offensive units. They are alternately available for recruitment
* Military Review: 50% resource costs for unit recruitments!
* Wandering Architect: 50% silver costs for constructing fortresses and cities; merging radius increased from 3 to 8 fields (fortress) and from 8 to 12 fields (city)
* Regards from the Guilds: 50% resource costs for upgrading buildings!

* Alliance Shop: In the brand-new Alliance Shop, the alliance coins can be exchanged for all kinds of resources, including Gold and Rubies!

Release Notes for 7.7.0

We are proud to announce new features in version 7.7.0! The very first subscriptions for Lords & Knights are now available on selected worlds!

Builder Pass:

The Builder Pass offers you the following advantages when building and expanding your empire:

- The resource production in your entire kingdom gets boosted by 20%!
- You get a 50% higher chance of obtaining a ruby when creating a city or a fortress!
- Upgrading buildings costs you 10% less resources!
- The silver costs of creating fortresses and cities are reduced by 20%!
- An additional master builder allows you to upgrade your habitat for gold directly!
- The building queue gets an additional free slot!

Warrior Pass:

The Warrior Pass grants you the following bonuses, which increase your military strength:

- The attack power of your units is increased by 20%!
- The defensive power of your units also increases by 20%!
- You get a 10% higher chance of obtaining a ruby when conquering habitats!
- Accelerate the purchase of habitats with a 20% reduced cooldown!
- The devastating siege weapons are always available for recruitment!
- Your troop recruitment queue gets an additional free slot!

Some new features initially are only active on selected worlds.
We continuously work to improve Lords & Knights and therefore applied several bug fixes and small improvements to optimize your gaming experience!

WINTER FESTIVAL
* We have planned a very special Advent calendar with events from the 1st of December to the 24th of December in order to get you in the mood for the upcoming holidays.
* In addition to daily changing special events, which will be announced shortly before their activation on Facebook and Instagram, the following special conditions apply during this time:
* New event-resource: Earn “Christmas-Emblems“ only during this event and exchange them for the precious Rubies by using your task list!
* A unique building “Christmas Bakery", that increases both resource production and the ruby drop chance while at the same time reducing all building costs!
* Attention: At the end of the event, the “Christmas Bakery” will be removed from the profile and its effect will be deactivated!
* Ruby events: Collect 3, 7, 14 and 24 emblems to earn special rewards
* A Ruby Package, which is only available at every advent

LEGENDARY LORD
* This year you can also unlock a mighty new Lord by partaking in the Winter Festival! Each day there is a new Lord piece to be found in the rewards of the daily special events!
* Keep playing, since you need at least 20 Lord pieces to unlock the new Lord!
We continuously work to improve Lords & Knights and therefore applied several bug fixes and small improvements to optimize your gaming experience!

VALENTINE’S SPECIAL: Lords & Knights celebrates the day of the loving with a huge LiveOps event from the 10th to 24th February.
* EXCLUSIVE SHOP PACKAGES: Three new packages are available during the special event. One of them even includes a 100% chance to get a free ruby, the most valuable resource in the game!
* TIME-LIMITED EVENT RESOURCE: The time-limited Valentine’s-Emblems can be earned only during the event. These emblems can be exchanged for the precious rubies, which enable players to conquer habitats without logistical efforts!
* THREE-PHASED IN-GAME EVENT
** Phase 1: Regards from the Guilds - 50% resource costs for upgrading buildings!
** Phase 2: Fortress / City Architect: 50% silver costs for creating fortresses and cities!
** Phase 3: Fight the Vacancy: 50% gold costs for buying free castles!

HEROES: With the release of the 8.3.0 version a new epic lord appears and can be unlocked during the „VALENTINE’S SPECIAL“.
* ONE FOR ALL AND ALL FOR ONE: A famous and powerful Lord joins your team! This exclusive hero can just be achieved by active players during the "Valentine’s Special“.

NEW FEATURES: A bunch of unique features and improvements will be available with the new version.
* MULTI UNIT SELECTOR: To speed up the community beloved "synchronise attack / support“ function, we are introducing this new feature: "Multi unit selector“.
We continuously work to improve Lords & Knights and therefore applied several bug fixes and small improvements to optimize your gaming experience!
We continuously work to improve Lords & Knights and therefore applied several bug fixes and small improvements to optimize your gaming experience!

NEW REGION WORLDS: The release of 7 brand-new Region Worlds will kick off the spring start! A tough challenge for our hardcore player-base.
* START A NEW EMPIRE: There’s always a good reason for a new beginning and freshly new world is the best way for it! Build up an enormous kingdom, conquer other castles, form strong alliances and keep up the pace.

SIGN IN WITH APPLE: Players have now the possibility to use their AppleID for account safety.
* MAKES LIFE EASIER: "Sign in with Apple“ allows our iOS-based community to create a verified and trustful account, to play on multiple devices and to save all their game progress easily and fast.

Celebrate with us the Easter event from 06.04.2020 11:00 CEST (05:00 am EDT) to 22.04.2020 11:00 CEST (05:00 am EDT), which holds the following for you:
- Earn “Easter-Emblems“ only available during this event and exchange them for the precious Rubies by using your task list!
- A unique building "chicken farm", that increases both resource production and the ruby drop chance while reducing building costs!

LK HEROES: A new and legendary lord enters the world of Lords & Knights!
- TRULY LEGENDARY: Players can unlock another legendary hero and use his incredible talents and skills to become the best king in Lords & Knights.
- NEW SKILLS AND TALENTS: The new Lord is an allrounder: The hero drops you a rare ruby now an then and increases your resource production drastically. He also increases the banner duration and the storage capacities for units and resources.

- A unique building "chicken farm", that increases both resource production and the ruby drop chance while reducing building costs!

THE NEXT GREAT FEATURE: Lords & Knights was one of the first Medieval MMOGs of the App Store with his Release in June 2011. In all these years it was an ever-evolving title with a huge fanbase and a passionate team behind it. We are happy to announce the next big feature which evolves the gamer further: THE COUNTRY!

GAIN NEW STRENGTH
The benefits of countries are freshly new and exciting. Researches can be finished a lot cheaper, the silver production will be increased enormously, units will be moving much faster and a lot more. The best thing will be the complete new tax system, which helps the leading alliances to become richer every day! A brand new incentive to pursue regions and form countries.

SUN FESTIVAL: The Sun Festival is live during the release of the 8.6.0 version and provides a lot of benefits to our community.

THREE IN-GAME EVENTS
Phase 1: Fight the Vacancy: -50% gold costs for buying free castles!
Phase 2: Regards from the Guilds -50% resource costs for upgrading buildings!
Phase 3: Fortress / City Architect: -50% silver costs for creating fortresses and cities!
We continuously work to improve Lords & Knights and therefore applied several bug fixes and small improvements to optimize your gaming experience!

ALLIANCE RANKS
Each alliance receives a specific alliance title depending on the current points count. Alliances can level up their rank to become the most powerful conquerors in Lords & Knights!

SPRING COUNTDOWN
Let's celebrate the beginning of spring with an awesome Event starting from March, 1st until March, 21st.

EASTER EGG HUNT: Lords & Knights will feature an awesome, two weeks long Live OP Easter event!

OVERVIEW
We celebrate the Easter time in Lords & Knights with a huge special event! A brand-new global building, special events, a new launch screen, heavily discounted packages and more await all players of Lords & Knights during Easter!

NEW FEATURES: A bunch of unique features and improvements will be available with the new version.

ALLIANCE RANKS
Each alliance has a specific title depending on their current points count. Players can level up the alliance and earn a new and better alliance rank to become the most powerful emperors in Lords & Knights!
